Package edu.uab.chattada.p5

Class Locker

java.lang.Object
edu.uab.chattada.p5.Locker
public class Locker extends Object
Super class Locker that controls how locker system operates
Author:
Chattada Viriyaphap <chattada@uab.edu>

    • unlock

      public void unlock(String username, String password)
      unlock to unlock the locker system using username and password as parameters
      Parameters:
      username - - String username (used to access locker system)
      password - - String password (used to access locker system)

    • add

      public void add(LockerItem item)
      add to add any item to the locker system
      Parameters:
      item - - LockerItem item (driver license, credit card, wireless access points, etc)

    • delete

      public void delete(LockerItem item)
      delete to delete any item from locker system
      Parameters:
      item - - LockerItem item (driver license, credit card, wireless access points, etc)

    • searchContains

      public ArrayList<String> searchContains(String text)
      searchContains to get the ArrayList of uids where input text is found inside locker system
      Parameters:
      text - - String input text used to search through all locker items inside locker system
      Returns:
      ArrayList of uids where the input text is found inside locker system

    • searchNameContains

      public ArrayList<String> searchNameContains(String text)
      searchNameContains to get the ArrayList of uids where input text is found as locker item's name inside locker system
      Parameters:
      text - - String input text used to search through all locker items' name inside locker system
      Returns:
      ArrayList of uids where the input text is found inside locker system

    • update

      public void update(LockerItem item)
      update to update the locker system (remove old info and add new info)
      Parameters:
      item - - input LockerItem item to be updated (remove old info and add new info)

    • get

      public LockerItem get(String uid)
      get to get the item that matches input uid
      Parameters:
      uid - - String input uid used to search for item inside locker system
      Returns:
      LockerItem item inside locker system that matches input uid

    • set

      public void set(String name, String value)
      set to set name and value of ArrayList of Fields inside locker system
      Parameters:
      name - - String input name of locker system
      value - - String input value of locker system
